      Methods in models that return types with arguments of type Statement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<Statement> Statement.findAllStatements(Interview interview, Time leftThreshold, Time rightThreshold)
      Gives all statements from database that have the given parent interview and lie between left and right threshold (both inclusive).
      static java.util.List<Statement> Statement.findAllStatements(Project project, Code code)
      Gives all statements from database that match the given project and code.
      java.util.List<Statement> Code.getOccurrence() 
      java.util.List<Statement> Interview.getStatements()
      This method gives all statements.
      java.util.List<Statement> Interview.getStatementsSorted()
      This method gives all statements sorted by time.
